org.ow2.proactive.scripting.helper.selection

Class SelectionUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ow2.proactive.scripting.helper.selection.SelectionUtils

  • @PublicAPI
public class SelectionUtils
extends Object
    SelectionUtils provides static methods for selection script. This class also defines the public operator that can be used in a script. So, when creating a Condition object pleased used LESS_THAN, GREATER_THAN, EQUAL or MATCH.
    Since:
    ProActive Scheduling 1.0

    • Method Detail

      • checkProperties

        public static boolean checkProperties(String configFilePath,
                                      Conditions conditions)
        Check all given conditions in the given configuration file path.
        This method returns true if (and only if) every conditions match the given file.
        Parameters:
        configFilePath - configuration path
        conditions - the conditions object (which is a collection of condition objects )
        Returns:
        true if every conditions match the given file.

      • checkProperty

        public static boolean checkProperty(String configFilePath,
                                    Condition condition)
        Check the condition in the given configuration file. Return true if the condition is accepted according to the given configuration file.
        Parameters:
        configFilePath - configuration file path
        condition - the condition to test
        Returns:
        true if the condition is accepted according to the given configuration file.

      • checkHostName

        public static boolean checkHostName(String hostName)
        Check if the host name is the given one.
        Parameters:
        hostName - the host name to check
        Returns:
        true if the given host is equals (ignore case) to the physic host name

      • checkIp

        public static boolean checkIp(String network)
        Check if the host matches the given IP address.
        The IP can be given as x.x.x.x or using the token * to match a network for example. (ie x.x.x.*)
        Parameters:
        network - the network to match
        Returns:
        true if the IP address matches the network

      • checkFileExist

        public static boolean checkFileExist(String filePath)
        Check if the given file path exist or not.
        Parameters:
        filePath - the file path to check
        Returns:
        true if the given file path exists

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        true if the OS name is the one expected

      • checkFreeMemory

        public static boolean checkFreeMemory(long requiredMemory)
        Check if there is enough free memory.
        Parameters:
        requiredMemory - the minimum amount of memory which is required (measured in byte)
        Returns:
        true if the required memory is equal or lesser than the available memory, false otherwise.

      • checkExec

        public static boolean checkExec(String fileName)
        Check if a file exist in folders contains in PATH environment variable
        Parameters:
        fileName - the name of the file which is required
        Returns:
        true if fileName exist in the "PATH" environment variable

      • checkWifi

        Check if a wireless network interface exist
        Returns:
        true if a wireless network interface has been found

      • checkFreeSpaceDiskAvailable

        public static boolean checkFreeSpaceDiskAvailable(Long space,
                                                  String path)
        Check if free space (for a specify path) is greater than space
        Parameters:
        space - the minimum required space
        path - the path which have the required space
        Returns:
        true if free space (for a specify path) is greater or equal than space
